\documentclass[craaa]{baaa}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%


\thematicarea{8}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%                                                                            %
%  Título. Este debe ser corto e informativo. Debe estar en minúsculas       %
%  salvo la primer letra y aquellas palabras que siempre se escriben con     %
%  mayúscula. Utilizar subtítulo solo en caso necesario. Para dividir un     %
%  título largo en más líneas utilizar el corte de línea (\\).               %
%                                                                            %
%  Title. It should be short and informative and should not be capitalized,  %
%  except for the first letter and any other words that are always           %
%  capitalized. Please only use subtitle if necessary. In order to split     %
%  a long \title across two or more lines, please insert linebreaks (\\).    %
%                                                                            %
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\title{Follow up of the study of magnetar XTE J1810-197}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%                                                                            %
%  El resumen puede estar escrito en castellano o inglés, a elección del     %
%  autor. El número máximo de caracteres permitidos es 1500 (mil quinientos),%
%  contabilizando espacios.                                                  %
%                                                                            %
%  The abstract can be written in Spanish or English, at the author's        %
%  choice. The maximum number of allowed characters is 1500 (one thousand    %
%  five hundred), counting spaces.                                           %
%                                                                            %
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\abstract{

Magnetars are a peculiar class of young, slowly rotating neutron stars with extremely strong surface magnetic fields ($B\sim10^{13} - 10^{10}\,\mathrm{G}$). They show a rich transient phenomenology, with giant flares, short bursts and outbursts, mostly detected on X-rays. Of the 30 known magnetars, only 6 have shown emission in radio frequencies. The emission from 5 of them was always associated with X-ray outbursts of the source. The remaining magnetar emitted Fast Radio Burst (FRB)-like bursts. Magnetar XTE J1810$-$197 was the first one detected in radio frequencies, and it underwent an outburst in late 2018. We started a high-cadence monitoring campaign on September 2022 with the radiotelescopes of the \textit{Instituto Argentino de Radioastronomía} (IAR). Here we report on the continuation of the study presented at last year's meeting, on single pulses detected from magnetar XTE J1810-197 four years after its outburst. In this case, we extended the analysis of observations until mid-July 2023, made with antenna  “Esteban Bajaja” (A2) with the ETTUS board on the receiver. We detected single pulses with $8\leq \mathrm{S/N} \leq40$. Here we present a statistical study of our sample, where there appear to be two different subgroups. In addition, we checked for simultaneous X-ray activity and its correlation with the radio observations by conducting an in-deep analysis of the light curves in the 2-20 keV band of the magnetar observed by the MAXI telescope. 

%\textbf{1434 caracteres, máximo 1500}


%Resumen en castellano o inglés. Máximo 1500 caracteres. Un buen resumen se caracteriza por su claridad y brevedad. Se sugiere que consista de un único párrafo. Cuando especifique detalles matemáticos solo precisa usar dos signos ``\$", uno para abrir y otro para cerrar el entorno matemático, como por ejemplo en este caso: $c\approx 3\times 10^8~\text{m}\,\text{s}^{-1}$. Note en este ejemplo el uso de comillas de apertura y cierre, y el uso de espacios indivisibles de diferente tipo dentro del entorno matemático. Recordamos que no deben incluirse citas en el resumen. Asimismo, debe evitarse el uso de abreviaturas, a menos que sean estrictamente necesarias o permitan reducir significativamente el número de caracteres del resumen. Finalmente, es recomendable que cada párrafo de texto en un archivo fuente de \LaTeX{} consista de una sola línea, como el texto de este resumen.
}

%                                                                            %
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\keywords{stars: magnetars --- radio continuum: stars --- methods: data analysis
}
